metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5607 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site request forgery in the REST API in IPython 2 and 3.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2015-5607` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ipython3 - 5.5.0-1
python3-ipython - 5.5.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ipython package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.5.0-1').
